Detailed Description

Format for a closure

Describe for each C++ type of closure the format of all associated objects.

bool DFG::ClosureFormat::is_ready ( RFO::Closure *  clo  )  const [virtual]

Return true iff the closure is ready for execution The readiness state of access should be propagate to the first next concurrent access.

Implements RFO::ClosureFormat.

Reimplemented in DFG::ClosureFormatDelete, DFG::ClosureFormatSignal, WS::ClosureFormatTerminaison, Sched::ClosureFormatPartitionTask, Sched::ClosureFormatStartTask, Sched::ClosureFormatSignalCtrlTask, Sched::ClosureFormatWaitCtrlTask, and Sched::ClosureFormatWaitEndTask.

void DFG::ClosureFormat::merge ( RFO::Closure *  clo  )  const [virtual]

Call after a theft closure is marked as terminated. Should be defined in order to merge context of theft closure to the normal thread of execution. Next accesses become ready.

Implements RFO::ClosureFormat.
